| History                 = According to the (potentially biased) description by [[Skeletron (Earth-616)|Skeletron]], the sole known surviving witness of these events,  species of a biomechanical nature -including intelligent species, such as Skeletron's- had been as numerous as organic ones in bygone times. The biomechanical species created the Turgentine Technenium, which became an interstellar empire of immense power.{{r|Starblast Vol 1 4}}

Eventually, the Technenium declared war on all the organic species. The Technenium was defeated and decimated through means lost to time. Surviving technoorganics like Skeletron{{r|Starblast Vol 1 4}} gathered to create a more modest would-be conquering armada: the [[Black Fleet (Earth-616)|Black Fleet]],{{r|Starblast Vol 1 4}}{{r|Secret Wars: Official Guide to the Marvel Multiverse Vol 1 1|; Chief Examiner's entry}} which was also destroyed in more recent times,{{r|Quasar Vol 1 42}} leaving Skeletron as the only known survivor.{{r|Starblast Vol 1 4}}
